newsitem.title: USA: CarrAmerica Realty says Thomas Carr new CEO.
newsitem.headline: CarrAmerica Realty says Thomas Carr new CEO.

text.p: WASHINGTON, May 8 (Reuter) CarrAmerica Realty Corp said Thursday at its annual meeting that Thomas Carr, president and chief operating officer and a director of the company, has been appointed chief executive.
The company said he replaces Oliver Carr Jr, who will continue as chairman of the board of directors.
The company said it also declared a first quarter dividend of $.4375 per share. The dividend will be payable to shareholders of record on May 23.
CarrAmerica stock will begin trading ex-dividend on May 21, and the dividend will be paid on June 6.
The company said it will release its first quarter earnings around May 15.
